summary: A French Intelligence Agent becomes embroiled in the Cold War politics first with uncovering the events leading up to the 1962 Cuban Missile Crisis, and then back to France to break up an international Russian spy ring.
cast: Frederick Stafford|Dany Robin|John Vernon|Karin Dor|Michel Piccoli|Philippe Noiret|Claude Jade|Michel Subor|Per-Axel Arosenius|Roscoe Lee Browne|Edmon Ryan|Sonja Kolthoff|Tina Hedström|John Van Dreelen|Donald Randolph|Roberto Contreras|Carlos Rivas|Roger Til|Lewis Charles|Sándor Szabó|Anna Navarro|Lew Brown|John Roper|George Skaff|John Forsythe|David Armstrong|Jack Berle|Manuel Cano|Fidel Castro|Dick Cherney|Rita Conde|Richard Derr|Ann Doran|Noel Drayton|Abel Fernandez|Elsa Fábregas|Gregory Gaye|Trent Gough|Raven Grey Eagle|Ernesto 'Che' Guevara|Rosa Guiñón|Dean Harens|Alfred Hitchcock|Robert Hitchcock|Shep Houghton|Ray Kellogg|Henry Kingi|John Lasell|Dionisio Macías|Pepe Mediavilla|Lawrence Montaigne|William H. O'Brien|Joe Pine|Tony Regan|Waclaw Rekwart|Leoda Richards|Clark Ross|José Luis Sansalvador|María Luisa Solá|John Stephenson|Robert Strong|Hal Taggart|Luree Wiese|Ben Wright
title: Topaz
